r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n:
This is the GA release of the 2.2.0 SDK. It includes more features to support new Couchbase Server 4.5 release and bug fixes.
Changes: * PCBC-393: Support for enhanced durability * PCBC-398: expose methods for parameterized N1QL queries * PCBC-382: cluster level authentication * Expose meta for N1QL and Search queries * Documentation updates and bug fixes
